author: Pamela McClintock
title: ‘Wicked: For Good’ to Cast Record $200M-Plus Opening Spell on the Box Office - The Hollywood Reporter
description: Ariana Grande and Cynthia Erivo reunite with filmmaker Jon M. Chu in the second installment of Universal's adaptation of the iconic Broadway play and book.
content:
There’s no place like home — except for if you want to go see the Witches of Oz make their return to the big screen.
Universal‘s Thanksgiving tentpole Wicked: For Good is all but guaranteed to bring… [+3102 chars]
